name: BIndicator
desc: The refresh indicator is used when showing an item is loading. It is kept hidden from the interface until it's status prop is changed to loading or ready.

infoArray.name: color
infoArray.desc: Override the theme's color of the indicator while it's status is 'ready' and it's percentage is less than 100.

infoArray.name: left
infoArray.desc: The absolute left position of the indicator in pixels.

infoArray.name: loadingColor
infoArray.desc: Override the theme's color of the indicator while it's status is 'loading' or when it's percentage is 100.

infoArray.name: percentage
infoArray.desc: The confirmation progress to fetch data. Max value is 100.

infoArray.name: status
infoArray.desc: The display status of the indicator. If the status is 'ready', the indicator will display the ready state arrow. If the status is 'loading', it will display the loading progress indicator. If the status is 'hide', the indicator will be hidden.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: top
infoArray.desc: The absolute top position of the indicator in pixels.
